participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and passionate about music, but struggles with self-doubt due to a lack of support.
participant_1.background: i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents aren't very supportive of my dream. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i am a musician and hope to make it big some day.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Frustrated and disillusioned with life, feeling trapped in a cycle of dissatisfaction.
participant_2.background: i hate my job. my wife spends all my money. i'm 40 years old. i work as a car salesman. i'm planning on getting a divorce.
